title: GOP Senate candidates thrash each other ahead of fight for majority

sentence: Mandela Barnes (D) said Johnson and his gun lobby-funded colleagues are the reason we haven't been able to pass commonsense gun reform, while Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry said Doing nothing has resulted in one thing: more dead children and the people of Wisconsin are tired of having a do-nothing Senator in Washington.
author: Julia Manchester
title: Emboldened Democrats eye Ron Johnson amid new controversies
